►►► This video ◄◄◄  

Mozilla has been on a decline for over a decade. Firefox marketshare dropped from 32% to just 3% and antitrust regulations mean Google might stop paying them for search engine placement. So now they are turning to online advertising. What gives?

The Story Behind

This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/techaltar-how-mozilla-lost-the-internet-whats-next
